QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Scholomance
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to Scholomance, east of Andorhal, immediately!$B$BRecent necromantic activity in the area points to Darkmaster Gandling, and a renewed effort to train powerful sorcerors for the scourge. If you so choose, travel to Scholomance to cleanse this bastion of evil from the Plaguelands.
